SENSES.SENSE: the mail , letters, packages, etc. that are delivered by the post office every day <font color=blue> ex: The mail came early today </font>
a posting , a message sent over the Internet to a newsgroup, etc.
a strong thick pole made of wood or metal that is put upright in the ground, used as part of a fence, gate, etc.<font color=blue> ex: His first kick hit the post. </font>
a local organization of people who have been in the military
a place where a large group of people in an army, navy, or air force work<font color=blue> ex: He was at his post at the gate from midnight until 3:00 a.m. </font>
